E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 6/12/1976
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Aurelio Lopez



Date: Friday, 6/13/1976
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Bill Dillman



Date: Saturday, 6/14/1976
Subject: Joe L. Morgan healing process
Joe L. Morgan is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1976
Subject: Joe Cannon failed learning new position
Joe Cannon doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Second Base.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director
